entry.title: Zelensky Removes Ukraine's General Prosecutor, Head of Secret Service
entry.content: Dismissals come amid allegations that employees in the two offices were collaborating with Russia.

entry.title: Afghan Economy Crumbles Since Taliban Takeover
entry.content: Businesses are struggling to import supplies or find customers who can pay amid crushing inflation and banking dysfunction, as the isolated government has driven away both foreign aid and investors.

entry.title: Putin Seeks to Cement Ties With Iran, Turkey in Rare Trip Abroad
entry.content: The Russian president’s trip comes just days after President Biden’s own tour of the Middle East, where he sought to rally Israel and Arab countries to counter Russia, China and Iran.
